text:
Hello Vincent !
Pleased to meet you.
Just a little about myself. I'm currently working for Industrial Light & Magic as a Creature Technical Director and have been in the industry for 5 years, before that I studied at Bournemouth University in Computer Visualisation and Animation.
I read into your profile that dexter has sent me that you also would like to get into rigging.
Feel free to ask any questions big or small, or if you have a portfolio we can even have a look at that.
Here's some of my past work that I've done in my career and during university : <https://vimeo.com/ziltz9>
